headline: Realty Income: Sleep Well At Night During Uncertain Times
summary: Realty Income's 56-year stability, A- credit rating, and 4.3% dividend CAGR make it a top pick during market uncertainty. See why O stock is buy rated.

headline: Realty Income Announces First Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced it will release its first quarter 2025 operating results after the New York Stock Exchange closes on May 5, 2025. Following publication of this earnings release, the company will host its quarterly investor call at 2:00 p.m. PDT, as will be the standard schedule moving forward.
